extDescription.message: A Chrome extension for annotating and translating text on web pages

debugProviderDesc.message: Returns fixed test data for development and debugging. No API calls required.

keepSecretSecure.message: Keep your App Secret secure. It will be stored locally.

howToGetCredentials.message: How to get Youdao API credentials:

credentialsStep4.message: Get your App Key and App Secret

credentialsStep5.message: Copy them to the fields above and save

freeApiDesc.message: Free API has usage limits but is sufficient for personal use. Uncheck if you have a Pro subscription.

howToGetDeeplCredentials.message: How to get DeepL API credentials:
howToGetDeeplCredentials.description: How to get DeepL credentials title

howToGetAiCredentials.message: How to get AI Translation API credentials:
howToGetAiCredentials.description: How to get AI translation credentials title

deeplCredentialsStep2.message: Sign up for a free or pro account

deeplCredentialsStep3.message: Get your API key from the account page

deeplCredentialsStep5.message: Copy your API key to the field above and save

phoneticFallbackDesc.message: When translation provider doesn't return phonetic information, automatically fetch it from external sources. Currently supports English phonetics (via FreeDictionary API). Future support planned for Chinese Pinyin and other languages.

phoneticFallbackStep1.message: Translation provider processes the word ‚Üí Returns translation and definitions

phoneticFallbackStep2.message: If no phonetics returned ‚Üí Automatically queries external API ‚Üí Gets phonetics

phoneticFallbackStep3.message: Result: Complete information with translation + definitions + phonetics

phoneticFallbackCurrentSupport.message: Current support: English phonetics (single words, via FreeDictionary API - free, no registration)

phoneticFallbackFutureSupport.message: Planned: Chinese Pinyin, and more languages

targetLanguageDesc.message: The default language to translate text into

maxExamplesDesc.message: How many example sentences to display (1-10)

autoCloseDelayDesc.message: Automatically close translation popup after this many seconds (0 = never)

annotationDefinitionsDesc.message: Display word definitions in annotations (‚ö†Ô∏è may be lengthy and affect experience)

showAudioInAnnotation.description: Show audio button in annotation label

annotationAudioDesc.message: Display audio pronunciation button in annotations
annotationAudioDesc.description: Show audio button in annotation description

annotationMinimumOneRequired.message: ‚ö†Ô∏è At least one of phonetics, translation, or definitions must be selected
annotationMinimumOneRequired.description: Annotation minimum one required validation message

hidePhoneticForMultipleWords.description: Hide phonetic for multiple words label

hidePhoneticForMultipleWordsDesc.message: Don't show phonetic annotations when multiple English words are selected
hidePhoneticForMultipleWordsDesc.description: Hide phonetic for multiple words description

menuButtonSizeDesc.message: Adjust the size of the buttons that appear when you select text

annotationTip.message: Tip: This setting affects the auto-translate feature in annotation mode. You can still manually enter any text you want for annotations.

cacheTip.message: Tip: Caching improves performance by storing recent translations locally. Larger cache size uses more memory but reduces API calls.

debugTip.message: Debug Mode: When enabled, detailed logs will be printed to the browser console. Use Debug provider for testing without API calls.

cannotClearOnThisPage.message: Cannot clear annotations on this page.

contentScriptNotAvailable.message: Content script not available on this page.

confirmReset.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to defaults?

confirmClearCache.message: Are you sure you want to clear the translation cache?

failedToClearCache.description: Error message when cache clearing fails

uiLanguageDesc.message: The language for the extension interface (requires page reload)

languageChangedReload.description: Message shown when language is changed

enableTranslationDesc.message: Show floating translation button (T) after text selection, click to view translation

enableAnnotationDesc.message: Show floating annotation button (A) after text selection, click to add translation annotation

currentServiceDesc.message: Select the translation service to use

quickServiceInfo.message: üí° Quick service selection for convenience. You can configure detailed settings for each service in their respective tabs.

googleIntro.message: Free translation service supporting over 100 languages, no API key required.

useGoogleTranslateDesc.message: Google Translate is free and requires no configuration. Click the button below to set it as your translation service.

googleInfoDesc.message: Google Translate is a free service and does not require API configuration. It is ready to use immediately.

youdaoIntro.message: Professional Chinese-English translation service with accurate results and rich dictionary features.

useYoudaoTranslateDesc.message: Set Youdao Translate as current translation service

youdaoStep4.message: Get your App Key and App Secret

youdaoStep5.message: Copy them to the fields above and save

deeplIntro.message: Acclaimed as the world's most accurate translation service, providing high-quality translations.

useDeeplTranslateDesc.message: Set DeepL as current translation service

deeplStep2.message: Sign up for a free or pro account

deeplStep3.message: Get your API key from the account page

deeplStep5.message: Copy your API key to the field above and save

deeplApiKeyDesc.message: Your DeepL API key (free or pro)

useFreeApiDesc.message: Free API has usage limits but is sufficient for personal use

openaiIntro.message: Use AI models for intelligent translation with context understanding and natural language processing. Supports OpenAI and OpenAI-compatible API services.

useOpenaiTranslateDesc.message: Set AI Translate as current translation service

openaiStep2.message: Sign up and get your API key

openaiStep4.message: Optionally configure custom base URL for other compatible API services

openaiStep5.message: Paste your API key and save

openaiApiKeyDesc.message: Your AI service API key (OpenAI keys start with sk-)

modelDesc.message: AI model to use (e.g., gpt-3.5-turbo, gpt-4, or other compatible models)

baseUrlDesc.message: API base URL (supports OpenAI and other compatible services)

openaiCompatible.message: üîß Supports OpenAI and compatible API services (e.g., Azure OpenAI, local LLMs, DeepSeek, etc.)

enableAudioDesc.message: Enable audio playback for word pronunciation

floatingButtonSizeDesc.message: Size of floating buttons shown after text selection

buttonSizeDesc.message: Size of buttons in the selection menu

enableCacheDesc.message: Cache translations to improve performance and reduce API calls

resetInfo.message: ‚ö†Ô∏è Reset all settings to their default values

clearCacheInfo.message: üóëÔ∏è Clear all cached translations to free up storage

actionsInfo.message: üí° These actions will take effect immediately and cannot be undone.

atLeastOneButtonRequired.message: ‚ö†Ô∏è At least one floating button must be shown
atLeastOneButtonRequired.description: Validation message for at least one button required

promptFormatDesc.message: Choose the data format returned by AI

useContextDesc.message: Provide surrounding text to improve translation accuracy

customPromptDesc.message: Advanced users can customize AI prompt templates

promptEditorInfo.message: Available placeholders: {text} - text to translate, {sourceLang} - source language, {targetLang} - target language, {context} - context

systemPromptLabel.message: System Prompt (Define AI's role and behavior)

contextTemplateLabel.message: Context Template (How to display context information)

translationCardSettingsDesc.message: Configure content and style settings for the translation card popup

audioSettingsDesc.message: Settings for audio playback and speech synthesis

dataSettings.description: Data and privacy settings page title

dataSettingsDesc.message: Manage your data, privacy and sync settings

showFloatingButtonDesc.message: Display translation and annotation buttons when text is selected

enableContextMenuDesc.message: Show translation and annotation options in right-click menu

phoneticDisplayDesc.message: Choose to display US, UK, or both phonetic notations

annotationFontSizeDesc.message: Adjust the size of annotation text

annotationColorDesc.message: Customize the color of annotation text

highlightAnnotatedTextDesc.message: Add background highlight to annotated text

highlightColorDesc.message: Choose the background highlight color for annotations

saveAnnotationHistoryDesc.message: Automatically save all annotation records for later review

exportAnnotationsDesc.message: Export annotation data as JSON or CSV format

clickTranslateButtonDesc.message: Show translation details when clicking the floating "T" button

doubleClickWordDesc.message: Automatically show translation when double-clicking a word on the page

hoverToTranslateDesc.message: Automatically show translation when hovering over text (experimental)

hoverDelayDesc.message: How long to hover before showing translation (milliseconds)

cardThemeDesc.message: Choose the color theme for translation cards

cardFontSizeDesc.message: Adjust the text size in translation cards

cardWidthDesc.message: Set the width of translation cards (pixels)

simplifyLongTextDesc.message: Use simplified interface for long text, showing only translation (no examples or phonetics)

simplifyThresholdDesc.message: Number of characters before enabling simplified UI

autoPlayAudioDesc.message: Automatically play pronunciation when opening translation card (annotation audio buttons still require manual click)

preferredVoiceDesc.message: Which pronunciation to prioritize when multiple options are available

audioSourcesDesc.message: Try different audio sources in priority order until playback succeeds

audioSourcesInfo.message: Drag to adjust priority order. System will try in sequence until playback succeeds.

ttsSpeedDesc.message: Adjust the playback speed of speech synthesis (0.5 - 2.0x)

ttsPitchDesc.message: Adjust the pitch of speech synthesis (0.5 - 2.0)

testTTSDesc.message: Play test text to preview current settings

enableChromeSyncDesc.message: Sync settings and annotation data across devices using your Chrome account

privacyInfo.message: All data syncs only locally and via your Chrome account, not sent to third-party servers. Translation API calls are excluded.

exportAllDataDesc.message: Export settings and annotation data as JSON file

importDataDesc.message: Restore data from previously exported JSON file

resetToDefaultsDesc.message: Restore all settings to default values (annotations not affected)

clearAllDataDesc.message: ‚ö†Ô∏è Dangerous operation: Delete all settings, cache and annotation data. This cannot be undone!

pageMovedDesc.message: The original "Display & Appearance" settings have been split into the following pages:

noAIProviders.message: No AI providers yet, click the button above to add one

providerNamePlaceholder.message: e.g., OpenAI, Azure OpenAI, Local Ollama

providerNameDesc.message: Give this AI provider a name for easy identification

apiKeyDesc.message: API Key obtained from the service provider

temperatureDesc.message: Controls creativity (0-1, lower is more accurate)

useContextDesc.message: Provide surrounding text to improve accuracy

connectionTestSuccess.message: ‚úÖ Connection test successful! API configuration is correct.

fillRequiredFields.message: Please fill in all required fields!

confirmDeleteProvider.message: Are you sure you want to delete this AI provider?

contextMenuAnnotatePage.description: Context menu option to enable vocabulary mode

contextMenuRemoveAnnotations.description: Context menu option to disable vocabulary mode

vocabularyModeTitle.description: Title for vocabulary mode settings section

enableVocabularyMode.description: Label for vocabulary mode enable toggle

vocabularyModeDescription.message: Automatically annotate words on the page based on your vocabulary level. Perfect for language learning while reading.

vocabularyModeCETModeAbove.description: Annotate words above the selected level

vocabularyModeCETModeExact.description: Annotate words in the exact level only

vocabularyModeCETIncludeBase.description: Option to include base vocabulary levels

vocabularyModeShowTranslation.description: Option to show translation in vocabulary annotations

vocabularyModeShowPhonetic.description: Option to show phonetics in vocabulary annotations

vocabularyModeAutoEnable.description: Option to automatically enable vocabulary mode when page loads

vocabularyModeDesc.message: Automatically annotate words based on your vocabulary level, perfect for language learning while reading
vocabularyModeDesc.description: Description of vocabulary mode feature in settings

vocabularyModeSwitch.description: Section title for vocabulary mode enable/disable

enableVocabularyModeDesc.message: Show 'Enable Vocabulary Mode' in context menu
enableVocabularyModeDesc.description: Description for vocabulary mode enable toggle

targetVocabularyDesc.message: Select vocabulary types to annotate (multiple selection allowed)

vocabularyMatchModeDesc.message: Matching rule when multiple vocabulary types are selected

matchModeHintAny.message: ‚Ä¢ Any: Annotate words with CET-6 OR TOEFL tag

matchModeHintAll.message: ‚Ä¢ All: Only annotate words with both CET-6 AND TOEFL tags

matchModeHintExact.message: ‚Ä¢ Exact: Only annotate words with exactly these two tags

includeBaseWords.description: Label for include base words option

includeBaseWordsDesc.message: Annotate CET-4 and other basic vocabulary

minCollinsStarsDesc.message: Only annotate words with specified star rating or higher (0 = no limit)

collinsStarsHint.message: Collins stars: 1-5 indicates word importance, 0 = no limit

vocabularyDataSource.description: Section title for vocabulary data source

dataSourceInfo.message: This extension uses ECDICT open source dictionary data (MIT License), containing 14,942 tagged vocabulary entries.

dataSourceStatsAdvanced.message: ‚Ä¢ Advanced Vocabulary: 5,300 words (GRE/Specialized words, loaded on demand)

statsNotAvailable.message: Statistics will be shown when pages are loaded
